lines.text: Sarge, movie starts in about five minutes. It's a double feature, Sarge. Two Bing Crosby pictures.
Snavely's at the Crosby double feature, so it's a cinch he's asleep.
Sorry, I bit your hand but I was dreaming about Nurse Krause, again.
I don't care if the Army does come first. As long as I'm the first woman.
Hey! Be careful! You want to muss my hair?
Don't shoot. I'm an American like you. I'm Calvin Coolidge Ishimura.
Yeah and I'm Sessue Hayakawa O'Farrell.
